tool_description: Add 20.000 SVG royalty-free original clipart for commercial use into your app, site, or project
name: Designious SVG Library
title: Designious SVG Library

api_list.name: /api/statistics
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://designious-svg-library1.p.rapidapi.com/api/statistics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "designious-svg-library1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://designious-svg-library1.p.rapidapi.com/api/statistics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "designious-svg-library1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
